thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
L’Entente Cordiale
President Trump’s meeting with French President Emmanuel Macron today is a test of whether personal chemistry between the two leaders can bridge a yawning policy divide on issues including climate change and the Iranian nuclear accord. Mr. Macron and German Chancellor Angela Merkel, who will visit the president separately on Friday, both hope to persuade Mr. Trump against pulling the U.S. out of the Iranian nuclear agreement at his self-imposed May 12 deadline. Mr. Trump could well come face...
